Spring 2021 Web 2620 Team

The team that made all of this possible

Rose Harris

WSU Senior

Survived this semester (and past year) out of spite. A global pandemic won't stop me from graduating on time, and it certainly won't stop me from finishing this final. Of course it all wouldn't be possible without the help of my "roomates".

Mieze

Three-legged Warrior

My primary contributions to this project are emotional support for Rose when she feels like crying on the couch instead of finishing her homework. Life is hard, but I work harder to make sure my owner stays happy.

Koshka

Fluffy Terror

If we're being honest I'm only credited here so I don't feel left out. While my owner and sister were working hard I was busying knocking over plants, scratching the couch, and getting high on catnip.

Created by Rose Harris.
